name: SHIELD Low!
description:
SHIELD Low!

You are a small fighter in pursuit of THE DREADNOUGHT, a massive rogue military space robot. In addition to standard laser cannons, both you and THE DREADNOUGHT are armed with a secret weapon; the SHIELD ATTACK: an extremely powerful form-- that requires shield energy to use. In each moment, you must strategically choose to either play it safe with a weak laser or go all out with the SHIELD ATTACK. And perhaps you may even defeat THE DREADNOUGHT by forcing it to face this same dilemma...
